Andrew Wolson

Web and Print designer

I am a User Experience designer located in beautiful Jacksonville, Florida. I create design solutions that balance the business needs with the client experience. Data is the backbone of my designs. I use it to create and improve the user experience.

  • find out more about me →

EverBank Loan Officer website

I was given the task of enhancing the user experience for the EverBank Loan Officer websites. The goal of the project was to get more new loan conversions and make it easier for existing customers to check on their loan status. The project was driven by web analytics, Loan Officer and client feedback.

  • see the full project →

FontSlate website

FontSlate is a personal project of mine that was originally a student project. I created the site because professors would tell me I was using the wrong type. But when I asked them why. They would have no answer for me. After researching and finding font resources are few and far between. I decided to create a site that displayed everything I had learned about typography.

  • see the full project →

wedding pieces

I designed the wedding materials for my own wedding. I actually wanted to avoid designing our materials. Because I didn’t want to deal with a bridezilla. Even worse… my bridezilla. I decided to make the materials when I saw what other designers were charging for templates and services. The thought of creating my own pieces from scratch with cheap fonts and stock photos brought me to the realization that I might as well do it myself.

  • see the full project →
